content.text:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To involve parent volunteers and older students in children's activities to facilitate involvement in focused, complex play:

1. Create a volunteer schedule for parents and older students
2. Train volunteers on how to facilitate complex play
3. Assign specific roles to volunteers (e.g., storyteller, game leader)
4. Plan structured activities that require adult guidance
5. Set up learning centers with volunteer supervision
6. Organize multi-age group projects
7. Implement a buddy system pairing younger and older students
8. Host family play days with parent-led activities
9. Encourage volunteers to model complex play scenarios
10. Provide materials for open-ended, imaginative play with adult support
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
